responsibilities.responsibilty: Creation of C# .Net 8 multiple isolated serverless computing ETL services which were triggered by Event hub and pushed contract and billing data into Cosmos DB (as long term access location) for a majority of records pertaining to millions of customer contracts. Wrote corresponding triggers that sent hot data records to Salesforce for active consumer processing.

Creation of ASP.Net core Web Services API in C# .Net 8 to provide searches across Cosmos DB containers. Web services implemented security middleware implemented JWT bearer authentication for security.
Customized Azure B2C policies to meet the needs of the business and integrated them into the Angular front end and C# .Net back end.
Diagnose and resolve Azure Managed services issues for multiple worldwide clients. Code modifications and feature creation of serverless functions for worldwide clients within the Azure sphere.
